text: In the Heat of the Night was an American television series that aired beginning March 1988 to May 1995 on the NBC and CBS networks. The show's themes dealt with racism, incest, corruption by government and abuse of drugs. ==References == == Other websites == * Category:1988 American television series debuts Category:1995 American television series endings Category:1980s American television series Category:1990s American television series Category:American crime drama television series Category:American police television series Category:CBS network shows Category:NBC network series Category:English-language television programs
title: In the Heat of the Night (TV series)
